body.p: 1. Ahilud’s son, one of 12 officers appointed to requisition food for King Solomon’s household. He served in the district of Taanach and Megiddo (1 Kgs 4:12).
2. Hushai’s son, another of King Solomon’s supply officers; his district was Asher and Aloth (1 Kgs 4:16).
3. Zadok’s father. Zadok helped Nehemiah rebuild the Jerusalem wall (Neh 3:4). He is possibly the same as Baanah (Neh 10:27).
